innovation.title: No Liquidation
innovation.content: With continuous compounding leverage, positions can be HODL'ed with no risk of liquidation or any hassle of re-compounding to retain maximum capital efficiency.

innovation.title: Infinite Liquidity
innovation.content: Liquidity is always available, regardless of the index price. Providers are protected from market volatility and incentivized with interest, fees, and premiums.

innovation.title: Fully On-Chain
innovation.content: Efficiently run on Ethereum mainnet with non-custodial smart-contracts, no backend service nor off-chain data. Opening and closing position costs no more than a token swap.

innovation.title: Hight Resistance
innovation.content: Perpetual pools are protected against manipulations and extractions with the double prices system, maturity, and premiums.

innovation.title: Open & Inclusive
innovation.content: Markets can be constructed for any token and leverage. Anyone can take sides, either as liquidity providers or long-short traders.

about.heading: Derivable is the first Perpetuals Automated Market Maker (AMM) Protocol with infinite liquidity and no liquidation.
about.explain: Derivable's innovative pricing mechanism utilizes a novel Asymptotic Power Curve to ensure that liquidity is always available, even during periods of extreme market volatility, and eliminates the risk of liquidation.

vision.text-1: We envision a DeFi ecosystems where any token or value can be traded with leverage, long and short, by anyone, from any sides of the market.
vision.text-2: Leverage positions can be HOLD'ed with no risk of liquidation, and the market liquidity is always available.

mission.text-1: Just as Uniswap has solved the spot DEX problems. We aim to solve the perpetual futures DEX problems with our novel derivatives pricing curve.
mission.text-2: With our AMM, users can create perpetual markets for any token with their preferred leverage, interest rate, premium, and fee, providing the DeFi community with an unprecedented tool for derivatives trading, asset hedging, and market making.
